response.original_title: There's a Bomb In Nan's Garden
response.overview: Marnie and her two brothers, Jack and Bill, have come to visit Nan for the weekend. The weather is glorious, so what better way to enjoy their time together than outside creating an epic Gnome-scape? However, not all is as it seems, as there is a fox amongst these pointy-hatted chickens… Exploring the joyous relationship between a grandparent and grandchildren, this silly and heartwarming adventure sees Marnie use her novice detective skills (and a little help from the internet!) to find out just what lies at the end of her Nan's garden and save the day… …or does she?
response.title: There's a Bomb In Nan's Garden
